wfenexus 0.1.0
  • Reference

Returns average ratings per dish.

Source: R/get_data_functions.R
ci_dishratings.Rd

Reads dishrating dataset, calculates average ratings per dish and aggregates that information to dishes' dataset.

ci_dishratings(dishes, dishratings)

Arguments

dishes

Dataframe containing information regarding
dishratings

Dataset containing dish ratings.

Value

Dishes dataframe with new columns, containing average ratings.
